verbose_text: We also utilize this in vitro system to assess the therapeutic effects of Niclosamide (NIC), an FDA approved anthelminthic recently identified in an anti-ZIKV drug screen, and found that it reduces ZIKV production, partially restores differentiation, and prevents apoptosis in hiNSCs.
evidence: FDA-approved anthelminthic recently identified in an anti-ZIKV drug screen, and found that it reduces ZIKV production, partially restores differentiation
